SELECT bid , cate_cd , title , content , tag , view_cnt , reg_id , reg_dt , edit_dt FROM TBL_BOARD
AND TITLE like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
AND CONTENT like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
AND REG_ID like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
ORDER BY bid DESC LIMIT #{startList}, #{listSize}

SELECT COUNT(*) AS listCnt FROM TBL_BOARD
AND TITLE like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
AND CONTENT like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
AND REG_ID like CONCAT('%',#{keyword},'%')
SELECT bid , cate_cd , title , content , tag , view_cnt , reg_id , reg_dt , edit_dt FROM TBL_BOARD WHERE bid = #{bid}
